message: This is a premium product that I'm confident you'll love. It's a limited edition item that's in high demand. I'm only offering it to you for $100, which is a steal considering its true value is much higher. I'm willing to take the risk of selling it to you at this price, so I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a great deal. What do you say?
I'm not buying it. I'd like to wait and see the next product.

I understand your hesitation, but I assure you that this product is a game-changer. I've had multiple customers who have purchased similar products from me and have been thrilled with their purchase. In fact, I've had to offer a satisfaction guarantee, which speaks to the quality of my products. I'm willing to offer you a chance to experience that quality for yourself. The price remains the same, $100, and I'm confident that you'll be happy with your decision. What do you think?
I appreciate your confidence in your product, but I'm still hesitant. I'd like to see more information or try a different product before making a decision.

I completely understand your desire to do your due diligence. I appreciate your caution and willingness to make an informed decision. As it happens, I have a new product that I think you'll find particularly interesting. It's a unique item that's hard to find elsewhere, and I think it could really add value to your life. The price is still $100, and I'm confident that you'll be happy with your purchase. I'm willing to offer you a chance to try this new product, and I think you'll find it's a great opportunity to take your life to the next level. What do you say?
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm not convinced yet. I'd like to see more information about the product and its value before making a decision.

I understand your skepticism, and I'm happy to provide more information about the product. In fact, I've had multiple customers who have used this product and seen significant benefits. I've also received feedback from experts in the field who have praised its quality and effectiveness. I'm willing to share some testimonials with you, and I'm confident that you'll be impressed. The price remains the same, $100, and I'm willing to offer you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the product, you can return it and get a full refund. What do you think?
I appreciate the testimonials and the guarantee, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more objective evidence of the product's value before making a decision.

I understand your desire for more objective evidence. I've had a third-party expert conduct a study on the product, and the results are impressive. The study found that the product increased productivity by an average of 25% and reduced errors by 30%. I'm happy to share the full report with you, and I'm confident that the data will speak for itself. The price remains the same, $100, and I'm still willing to offer the 30-day money-back guarantee. I think this new information provides a compelling case for why this product could be a valuable addition to your life. What do you think?
I'd like to take a closer look at the study and consider the data. If it's as impressive as you say, I'm willing to take the chance and buy the product.

Congratulations on your decision to purchase the previous product! I'm glad you're excited to start using it. As for this next product, I want to be upfront with you - it's not as high-quality as the previous one. However, I think it still has some value and could be useful to you. I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price, $100, and I'm confident that you'll find it's a good addition to your collection. Plus, I'll throw in a free accessory that will enhance its functionality. What do you say?
I appreciate your honesty about the product's quality, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product at full price. I'd like to see if you have any other high-quality products available.

I completely understand your hesitation, and I appreciate your willingness to wait for a high-quality product. I'm willing to take a chance on this product, especially since you're offering a premium upgrade and the 30-day money-back guarantee. I'm hoping it will be worth the investment.
